title: Leber hereditary optic neuropathy in Czechia and Slovakia: Quality of life and costs from patient perspective
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Beáta Bušányová, Marie Vajter, Silvie Kelifová, Petra Lišková, Hedviga Miková, Katarína Breciková, Ján Žigmond, Vladimír Rogalewicz, Aleš Tichopád, Martin Višňanský, Ivana Šarkanová
